result.markdown:
--- title: "HK whisk bar" subtitle: "with leaflet" author: "Tony Duan" execute: warning: false error: false format: html: toc: true toc-location: right code-fold: show code-tools: true number-sections: true code-block-bg: true code-block-border-left: "#31BAE9" code-copy: true --- # data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(rvest) library(chromote) library(janitor) library(tidygeocoder) library(leaflet) library(sf) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} bar_name=c('Maltcask@太子','House Welley@中環','Casky@灣仔') bar_address=c('169 Sai Yeung Choi St N, Mong Kok,Hongkong','97 Wellington St, Central,Hongkong','20-24 Lockhart Road, Wan Chai,Hongkong') bar_logo=c('https://img.shoplineapp.com/media/image_clips/62f16f8d7df01b0025a82bad/original.png','https://static.wixstatic.com/media/2d390e_27d0b3da21a94459bccf741600782591~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_160,h_160,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/Grey.jpg','https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQsSelY2PRVxaxyU_Ydf9CHgtUrClzpxpqJ2g&s') data001=tibble(bar_name,bar_address,bar_logo) ``` ::: # search all address to latitude, longitude ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # geocode the addresses data002 =data001 %>% geocode(bar_address, method = 'osm',lat = latitude , long = longitude) glimpse(data002) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 3 Columns: 5 $ bar_name "Maltcask@太子", "House Welley@中環", "Casky@灣仔" $ bar_address "169 Sai Yeung Choi St N, Mong Kok,Hongkong", "97 Wellingt… $ bar_logo "https://img.shoplineapp.com/media/image_clips/62f16f8d7df… $ latitude 22.32588, 22.28360, 22.27833 $ longitude 114.1687, 114.1543, 114.1696 ``` ::: ::: # map ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # Choose Icon: leafIcons <- icons(data002$bar_logo,iconWidth =60, iconHeight = 50) m <- leaflet() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles addTiles() %>% # add markers addMarkers(lng=data002$longitude, lat=data002$latitude,icon = leafIcons) m ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} m <- leaflet(height=2000, width=2000) %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles addTiles() %>% # add markers addPopups( lng=data002$longitude, lat=data002$latitude, data002$bar_name ,options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE) ) m ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} m <- leaflet(height=2500, width=2000) %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles addTiles() %>% # add markers addMarkers( lng=data002$longitude, lat=data002$latitude ,label = data002$bar_name,options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE), labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = "bottom", style = list( "color" = "red", "font-family" = "serif", "font-style" = "italic", "box-shadow" = "2px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.25)", "font-size" = "12px", "border-color" = "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)" ))) m ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: # resouce: https://www.gunviolencearchive.org/reports/mass-shooting?page=8&year=2023
